channel.title: Home on Student
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Student

item.title: Bioinformatics and Machine Learning
item.description: Investigated microbial community stability using cNODE to predict temporal interactions and species composition.

item.title: LLM Interpretability and Evaluation
item.description: Studied Transformer internal logic and implemented RAG to address the ‘black-box’ nature of LLMs

item.title: Daily Pulse: News Summary Aggregator
item.description: A hackathon built news aggregator that turns daily headlines into short, neutral bullet summaries across multiple categories.

item.title: About
item.description:
Short Bio

Hi，I’m Yuxiang (Elias). I’m a first year Computer Science student at OSU. I’m interested in AI, data analysis, and building high tech tools that solve real-world problems. I enjoy work where you can’t “fake it”，the data is imperfect, the system is complex, and progress comes from testing, iterating, and staying honest about what holds up. I value teamwork and service, and I try to show up consistently whether that’s in a lab, a project team, or community work. Long term, I want to build technology that helps people live better, with the hope of contributing, however small to a more peaceful and caring world.

item.title: Academics/Skills
item.description:
Snapshot

  • Major: Computer Science Engineering
  • GPA: 3.94

Skills / Tools

Languages

  • Python · R · Java · HTML/CSS · basic JavaScript

Data & Visualization

  • pandas/NumPy · data cleaning & analysis
  • matplotlib (plots for reports and projects)
  • working with time-series data (basic)

ML / Modeling (coursework + projects)

  • PyTorch (training/evaluation workflow, basic)
  • model validation and experiment tracking (basic)

others

  • Adobe Premiere Pro (video editing)
  • Microsoft 360
  • writing clear documentation and keeping projects organized

Coursework

Java Development: Covers the fundamentals of object-oriented programming and application building

item.title: Meridian (Career Intelligence SaaS)
item.description: A technical foundation for a career pathing platform designed to solve the ‘structural mismatch’ in the labor market using Next.js 15 and AI-driven parsing..

item.title: Works
item.description:
Featured

Research Assistant — Microbiome Lab (OSU) (Aug 2025–Present) — Reproducing and improving cNODE with PyTorch; combining it with gLV-style dynamics for microbiome time-series simulation and analysis.

  • Marketing & Campus Promotion Intern — DreamBigCareer (Jul 2025–Present) — Social media promotion, student feedback collection, and event support
  • Operations & Data Intern — Pikacard LLC (Sep 2025–Dec 2025) — Shipment tracking, order issue handling, and process improvement suggestions to reduce delays.
  • Line Cook / Steward — The Blackwell Inn (OSU) (Feb 3, 2026–Present) — Kitchen support and service operations.
  • Kitchen Staff — Chimama Noodle House (Jun 2022–May 2025) — Prep, Cook,plating support during peak hours, and kitchen hygiene/inventory organization.

Community & Leadership (Volunteer)

  • Tzu Chi Charity Foundation (Sep 2025–Present) — Nursing home visits and community clean-up support.
  • Mid-Ohio Worker Association (Sep 2025–Present) — Food drive distribution and community canvassing/outreach on worker benefits/resources.
  • Clearview Success After-School Program (Jun 2023–Sep 2023) — Tutoring support (math/reading) and classroom management assistance.
  • HR Team Member — OSU CSSS Student Organization (Sep 2025–Present) — Volunteer check-in/grouping for events and on-site logistics support.
